# 2. Statistical Learning 

## Learning objectives

- Compare supervised vs unsupervised learning.
- Compare regression vs classification problems.
- Measure the accuracy of regression model fits.
- Measure the accuracy of classification model fits.
- Describe the trade-off between more accurate models and more interpretable models.
- Compare Parametric vs Nonparametric models
- Understand overfitting.
- Describe how bias and variance contribute to the model error.
